import {useDispatch} from "react-redux"; const TweetItem = ({tweet}) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const deleteTweetClickHandler = () => { dispatch({type: 'delete-tweet', tweet}) } return(
{tweet.name} ·


{tweet.website}
{tweet.comments} {tweet.reshare} {tweet.likes}
); } export default TweetItem;
